Source.Name: radeon-profile-daemon
Source.Summary: Daemon to allow radeon-profile to run as normal user
Source.Description: System daemon for reading info about Radeon GPU clocks and volts as well as control card power profiles so the GUI radeon-profile application can be run as normal user.

Package.Name: radeon-profile-daemon
Package.Summary: Daemon to allow radeon-profile to run as normal user
Package.Description: System daemon for reading info about Radeon GPU clocks and volts as well as control card power profiles so the GUI radeon-profile application can be run as normal user.
